=== Where can I find out what the Kernel Team is doing? ===

The Kernel Team has a weekly status meeting to report on progress and to discuss issues.  These meetings are held on <code>#ubuntu-meeting</code> on <nowiki>[[Libera.chat]]</nowiki> every Tuesday at 1700 UTC.  Meeting agendas and previous meeting minutes can be found at <nowiki>[[KernelTeam-Meeting]]</nowiki>.  There is also an accumulated live status for the current development release tasks, see <nowiki>[[Kernel-Release]]</nowiki>.
